prompts.name: Score Rationale Judge
prompts.description: Verifies that narrative rationale logically supports the assigned scores. Catches mismatches between glowing language and low scores.

prompts.name: Citation Verification Judge
prompts.description: Verifies that citations actually support their claims. Checks URL accessibility and content accuracy.

prompts.name: Factual Accuracy Judge
prompts.description: Cross-references facts in narratives against source data. Catches hallucinated numbers, dates, and claims.

prompts.name: Zakat Classification Judge
prompts.description: Validates zakat eligibility claims against source evidence. Prevents false zakat-eligible classifications.

prompts.name: Homepage Extraction
prompts.description: Extracts mission, target populations, and founding year from charity homepages.

prompts.name: About Page Extraction
prompts.description: Extracts detailed mission, vision, values, and organizational information.

prompts.name: Programs Page Extraction
prompts.description: Extracts program descriptions and service areas from charity program pages.

prompts.name: Impact Page Extraction
prompts.description: Extracts impact metrics, beneficiary counts, and outcome statistics.

prompts.name: Donation Page Extraction
prompts.description: Extracts tax-deductibility status and payment methods from donation pages.

prompts.name: Contact/Leadership Extraction
prompts.description: Extracts leadership team members, titles, and organizational structure.

prompts.name: Zakat Page Extraction
prompts.description: Extracts zakat eligibility claims, asnaf categories served, and scholarly endorsements.

prompts.name: Baseline Narrative Generator
prompts.description: Generates baseline evaluation narratives with Wikipedia-style citations. Core narrative seen by all users.

prompts.name: Rich Narrative Generator (v2)
prompts.description: Investment memo-style deep analysis with inline citations. Premium content for logged-in users.

prompts.name: Charity Navigator Financial Extractor
prompts.description: Extracts detailed financial metrics from Charity Navigator pages into structured schema.

prompts.name: Advocacy & Civic Category Calibration
prompts.description: Calibrates scoring for advocacy and civic engagement organizations. Adjusts benchmarks for lobbying-adjacent work.

prompts.name: Basic Needs Category Calibration
prompts.description: Calibrates scoring for food, shelter, and emergency assistance organizations.

prompts.name: Civil Rights & Legal Category Calibration
prompts.description: Calibrates scoring for civil rights and legal aid organizations.

prompts.name: Higher Religious Education Category Calibration
prompts.description: Calibrates scoring for Islamic seminaries, religious colleges, and scholarship programs.

prompts.name: International Education Category Calibration
prompts.description: Calibrates scoring for education programs in developing countries.

prompts.name: K-12 Religious Education Category Calibration
prompts.description: Calibrates scoring for Islamic schools, weekend programs, and youth education.

prompts.name: Environment & Climate Category Calibration
prompts.description: Calibrates scoring for environmental conservation and climate action organizations.

prompts.name: Humanitarian Category Calibration
prompts.description: Calibrates scoring for emergency response and humanitarian aid organizations.

prompts.name: Media & Journalism Category Calibration
prompts.description: Calibrates scoring for Muslim media outlets, journalism, and content creation.

prompts.name: Medical & Health Category Calibration
prompts.description: Calibrates scoring for healthcare, mental health, and medical assistance organizations.

prompts.name: Philanthropy & Grantmaking Category Calibration
prompts.description: Calibrates scoring for donor-advised funds, foundations, and grantmaking organizations.

prompts.name: Religious Congregation Category Calibration
prompts.description: Calibrates scoring for mosques and Islamic centers with 501(c)(3) status.

prompts.name: Religious Outreach Category Calibration
prompts.description: Calibrates scoring for dawah, convert support, and Islamic education outreach.

prompts.name: Research & Policy Category Calibration
prompts.description: Calibrates scoring for think tanks, research institutions, and policy advocacy.

prompts.name: Social Services Category Calibration
prompts.description: Calibrates scoring for family services, counseling, and community support organizations.

prompts.name: Women's Services Category Calibration
prompts.description: Calibrates scoring for women's shelters, empowerment programs, and gender-specific services.

categories.name: Quality Validation
categories.description: Prompts that verify accuracy and consistency of generated content

categories.name: Data Extraction
categories.description: Prompts that extract structured data from charity websites

categories.name: Category Calibration
categories.description: Cause-specific prompts that adjust scoring benchmarks (planned)
